attributes.action: Recover all monies given to the banks and distribute to the citizens of this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As ther are some 20 million citizens over 50 years of age give each person £1m on condition they pay off their mortgages and all debts. This will wipe out the national personal debt at a stroke giving the banks funds to lend elsewhere. Then People will be able to purchase more goods and therby clear the financial mesh the Politians and banks got us into. This can be funded by the billions given to the bank being recovered to the treasury.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
